page.title: 11Day in Life of N.Bannister
page.content: I wake up at about 6.30 almost every day.I get washed and dressed at quarter to eight.When I have got washed and dressed I have my breakfast.I have some cereal,a cup of tea and one and a half pieces of toast.I put my shoes on and pack my bag.I then go to school.I walk half way with my mum and I ride my bike the other half.When I get to school I lock my bike to the fence.The time before school starts I play football.When the whistle goes we go to the classroom and we start our work.When the bell goes we go down to Assembly in the hall.
